input.sentences: we decided to pitch our tents on the grass next to the parking lot .
the whole group was just sitting around the picnic table talking and laughing .
one friend ran the grill and cooked lunch for everyone .
a picnic outside was really enjoyable .
after dark fell | we sat around the campfire telling stories .
output.sentences: We pitched our tents alongside the field designated for parking.
Sitting around the table, we talked of our lives.
Eddie ran the grill, preparing us a wonderful lunch.
It led to a wonderful evening of telling stories by the fire.
